root.name: James Pond: Underwater Agent
root.description: Overview A game where you play a fish that swims around and cleans up the polluted water. The game spoofs the James Bond franchise. For example, the levels have names like "From Three Mile Island With Love", "A View to a Spill" and "Leak and Let Die".Â Gameplay elements incorporate using a few gadgets like a time bomb, keys, cages, etc.
